text: The People of God Dwell in Unity
A song of ascents. Of David.\f + \fr Ps 133 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm \f*
Look, how good and how pleasant \add it is\add*
\add when\add* brothers dwell together in unity.
\add It is\add* like the fragrant oil upon the head,
running down upon the beard, the beard of Aaron,
that runs down upon the edges of his robes.
\add It is\add* like the dew of Hermon that runs down
because there Yahweh commanded the blessingâ€”
